heading: HR02441
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE JOINT LEGISLATIVE-EXECUTIVE DEVELOPMENT ADVISORY COUNCIL (LEDAC), NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, LOCAL  GOVERNMENT UNITS, AND THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT TO CONVENE A GOVERNMENT AUDITING REFORM SUMMIT IN 2019 FOR THE PURPOSE OF CRAFTING A BILL TO REFORM, UPDATE, AND FUTURE-PROOF THE CONDUCT OF STATE AUDITING  IN THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2019-01-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02441
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE JOINT LEGISLATIVE-EXECUTIVE DEVELOPMENT ADVISORY COUNCIL (LEDAC), NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS, AND THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT TO CONVENE A GOVERNMENT AUDITING REFORM SUMMIT IN 2019 FOR THE PURPOSE OF CRAFTING A BILL TO REFORM, UPDATE, AND FUTURE-PROOF THE CONDUCT OF STATE AUDITING IN THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : UY, JULIETTE T.
